amendment.description: Manager's amendment makes both technical corrections and substantive changes to the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 112-46 to make technical corrections to provisions in the underlying bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 251 - 168 (Roll no. 207).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 251 - 168 (Roll no. 207).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Mica.
